2087080.name: Land of Borealia
2087080.description:
Land of Borealia includes fast-paced tower defense gameplay where your movement is just as important as your strategy.

Embark on an exciting new adventure

Take on the role of Bolchie, a plucky Borealian with enough wits to match his heart on a quest to save the Land of Borealia from the evil Pale Dragon and his dark minions! Use a wide array of abilities to platform your way across the expansive islands and utilize ancient technology to protect its current inhabitants.

Fast motion, faster progression

Move quick, jump high and soar through the skies with fluid control as you delve into temples, scale towers or roam freely in this 3D puzzle-platformer with tower defense elements.

The world at your paws

Explore the varied landscapes of Borealia, each more peculiar than the one before, filled to the brim with puzzles, challenges, quests, collectibles and other side content galore. Don’t forget to revisit islands to access previously unreachable places!

Protector of the realm

Guard the denizens of each island in thrilling tower-defense combat where victory not only depends on your keen mind but also on sharp reflexes. Hurry from turret to turret, collect crystals to keep them active and take control of the battlefield in hectic final quests!

Reconnect with your roots

Bolster Bolchie’s arsenal of equipment by finding lost blueprints or improve his capabilities even further by uncovering antique scrolls.

Crazy conundrums

Brain-teasing puzzles utilizing the open-zone in creative ways await you on your journey.

Trials and tribulations

Find the sacred portals of the Borealians to enter the sky islands where your skills will be pushed to their limit.

Stylish threads

Customize how Bolchie looks with unique articles of clothing that can all be unlocked throughout the game such as colorful tunics or gliders themed after the four seasons and different butterfly patterns. Come up with your own attire for Bolchie and make him the most fashionable Borealian ever!

Key Features:
  • 4 distinct, vast islands to discover with new content always right around the corner
  • 16+ special challenge levels waiting to be tackled
  • Non-linear, open-zone gameplay
  • Momentum-based 3D platforming
  • Dynamic tower-defence action that mixes strategy with movement
  • Metroidvania-esque progression system
  • Diverse puzzles to work your mind
  • Able to personalize your own character
